tasks.task: Plowing a field with a tractor
subtasks: sitting in tractor seat
operating steering wheel to guide the tractor
using control levers to raise and lower plow
engaging hydraulic system to lift attachments
adjusting speed to match plowing requirements

tasks.task: Attaching a plow to the tractor
subtasks: Securing plow to the tractor's implement hitch
Checking that the plow is secure before operation
Adjusting planter settings on the tractor
Walking behind the planted rows to check seed placement
Feeding soybean seeds into the planter hopper

tasks.task: Applying herbicide to the soybean field
subtasks: Loading the spray tank with herbicide solution
Attaching the herbicide sprayer to the tractor
Guiding the tractor along the rows
Adjusting the nozzle pressure and swath width
Attaching the combine harvester to the tractor
Guiding the combine through the soybean field
Operating the combine's cutting mechanism
Adjusting the combine's header to match crop height
Monitoring grain moisture content in the combine
Separating grain from chaff and stems
Screening out impurities from the harvested soybeans
Stacking clean soybeans into bags or bins
Pushing the hoe through the soil to break up clumps
Walking through the pigsty
Collecting feed from feed bins
Distributing feed to individual pig troughs
Removing manure from stalls
Spraying disinfectant solution on stall floors
